amendment.description: To create a reserve fund for extension of the treatment of combat pay as earned income for purposes of the earned income tax credit and the child tax credit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 252 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 252 proposed by Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S2943) To create a reserve fund for extension of the treatment of combat pay as earned income for purposes of the earned income tax credit and the child tax credit.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 252 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 252 proposed by Senator Pryor.
